ygData.subject: Re: sphere of light
ygData.msgSnippet: Even if you could, sphere s of light disapeer when you camp.  So I doubt you would get much money for them anyways. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Even if you could, sphere's of light disapeer when you camp. So I doubt you
would get much money for them anyways.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard.


-----Original Message-----

>From: IF255@...
>
> I was wondering if you can do the same thing with sphere of light

are
